name: Hardest More from the Old West Trivia Quiz | Movie Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Prior to the Daniel Day-Lewis version, there was an earlier (from the 30's) version of 'Last of the Mohicans. It starred ...?
In the James Stewart version of 'Destry Rides Again', this actress made something of a comeback in a role as a saloon singer.
questions.explanation:
Marlene Dietrich.

	It features the song 'see what the boys in the back room will have'

questions.text: James Stewart's best Western (in my opinion) was 'Broken Arrow'. Who played Cochise?
questions.explanation:
Jeff Chandler.

	Probably Chandler's best role

questions.text: Unlikely people sometimes appear in Westerns. Shirley Temple had a key role in ...?
questions.explanation:
Fort Apache.

	I believe that this is where she met her one-time husband, John Agar.

questions.text: Also unlikely: Marilyn Monroe in a Western.
questions.explanation:
River of No Return.

	Enjoyable. With Robert Mitchum.

questions.text: In 'Nevada Smith', Steve McQueen pursues all of the following EXCEPT ?
Which is not an Errol Flynn western?
options: They Died With Their Boots On
questions.explanation:
Man of the West.

	It features Gary Cooper and Julie London.

questions.text: John Wayne and Dean Martin were good friends. They acted together in ...?
Ward Bond also popped up in a lot of John Wayne movies - but NOT this one.
questions.explanation:
The Shootist.

	Bond was always a solid supporting actor.
